page.title: 11Industry.
page.content:
The biggest employer in our area is Whitecroft Scovill.This year the firm celebrates 70 years of constant operation's from the same site at map ref 620/062.We visted the factory Mr Watkins showed us round. We saw paper clips including brightly coloured ones made, all sizes of safety pins, and dressmaking pins cut and shaped.The firm makes gripper snapper buttons in lots of colours,we saw the testing room where they are washed and pulled about.Mr Watkins told us that the firm make machines for other firms,and design their own machines.We liked the shed where the pins are dipped in chemicals to make them shiny.
Judith Wensley.
